meanings.definition: Extremely small or tiny in size.
meanings.sent1: The teentsiest ant crawled across the sidewalk.
meanings.sent2: She found the teentsiest seashell on the beach.
meanings.sent3: The teentsiest cupcake was too cute to eat.
meanings.sent4: Her teentsiest earring was lost in the sand.
meanings.sent5: The teentsiest star twinkled in the night sky.

meanings.definition: Of the smallest degree or amount.
meanings.sent1: It was the teentsiest hint of a smile on his face.
meanings.sent2: She felt the teentsiest bit of excitement in her heart.
meanings.sent3: The teentsiest drop of rain made her laugh.
meanings.sent4: His teentsiest effort made a big difference.
meanings.sent5: The teentsiest sound echoed in the empty room.
